page.title: 12Parents Hobbies 2.
page.content: My dad's hobby is fishing, he likes this because it gets him out in the country. He likes it best when the sun is shining because he says that it's the best time to catch fish.Dad has liked fishing ever since he was a small boy, the first time he went fishing he used a long stick and a piece of string tied to one end,this had a loop so that the worm used as bait could be fastened.Today he uses a float attached to a line with a hook on the end. In his young days he said he didn't catch many fish because the string was not strong enough and he wasn't quick enough to pull up the fish. Mum's hobby is gardening she does it partly because she enjoys it and partly because dad doesn't get the time.She works hard sowing seeds cutting grass and weeding.
